AboutPage.p1: I am Simeon Ohlsen - dancer, musician and art mediator.
AboutPage.p2: My passion is the combination of movement and sound, improvisation and structure, personal expression and communal experience.
AboutPage.p3: My path has taken me from music to dance, from theory to practice and from the stage to educational workshops.
AboutPage.p4: Today I work as a dancer, choreographer and art mediator, helping people to rediscover themselves through movement and voice.
AboutPage.p5: My focus is on making artistic processes accessible to anyone who is curious. My work is characterised by openness, curiosity and the conviction that art is a language that everyone can understand.
